subject: question about my order
description_text:
Hi, when i try to track my order i see that my order is unfulfilled.
Do you know why I got that ?

conversations.body_text: Hi arthur francois,    Your order has been shipped. Here is your tracking link. It is expected to arrive around the 9th.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3262110117249
